description: Unique identifier for the soil sampling location or observation.
Longitude coordinate of the sampling location in decimal degrees.
Latitude coordinate of the sampling location in decimal degrees.
Start date of the period during which the soil observation or aggregation is valid.
End date of the period during which the soil observation or aggregation is valid.
Lower depth boundary of the soil horizon in centimetres.
Upper depth boundary of the soil horizon in centimetres.
Textual representation of the soil depth interval (e.g. '20â€“50 cm').
Extractable aluminium concentration in the soil (mg/kg or 1ppm).
Extractable boron concentration in the soil (mg/kg or 1ppm).
Extractable calcium concentration in the soil (mg/kg or 1ppm).
Organic carbon by combustion after acidification (mg/kg or 1ppm).
Total carbon by combustion (mg/kg or 1ppm).
Extractable copper concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Electrical conductivity, saturation extract (dS/m).
Extractable iron concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Extractable magnesium concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Extractable manganese concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Nitrogen content of the soil.
pH, measured in 1:1 soil-water suspension.
Extractable phosphorus concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Extractable potassium concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Extractable sodium concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Sulphur concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
Extractable zinc concentration in the soil (mg/kg).
